attributes.action: help the BRITISH ciztizen more than immigrants and deport ones that have no reason to be here
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: how come immigrants have more help from the british government than the british citizens themselves e.g benefits, housing healthcare etc when we all have to work and still struggle?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
